Text: Pay for it. It's one of the cheapest game around and the author really deserve it.
i agree - this game is really worth paying for - it's the most creative thing ever made

If you believe in paying for your games, why do you bother with torrent sites? Don't give me that "I like to try it before I buy it" crap, either - thats what Shareware and demo discs are for.
Hmm. Or maybe I'm missing something.
